name: $substance
desc: Returns: Identification of the specific substance (or pharmaceutical product) considered to be responsible for the Adverse Reaction event. Note: the substance for a specific reaction may be different from the substance identified as the cause of the risk, but it must be consistent with it. For instance, it may be a more specific substance (e.g. a brand medication) or a composite product that includes the identified substance. It must be clinically safe to only process the 'code' and ignore the 'reaction.substance'.

name: $manifestation
desc: Returns: Clinical symptoms and/or signs that are observed or associated with the adverse reaction event.

name: $addmanifestation
desc: Clinical symptoms and/or signs that are observed or associated with the adverse reaction event.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Clinical symptoms and/or signs that are observed or associated with the adverse reaction event.

name: $description
desc: Returns: Text description about the reaction as a whole, including details of the manifestation if required.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Text description about the reaction as a whole, including details of the manifestation if required.

name: $onset
desc: Returns: Record of the date and/or time of the onset of the Reaction.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Record of the date and/or time of the onset of the Reaction.

name: $severity
desc: Returns: Clinical assessment of the severity of the reaction event as a whole, potentially considering multiple different manifestations.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Clinical assessment of the severity of the reaction event as a whole, potentially considering multiple different manifestations.

name: $exposureRoute
desc: Returns: Identification of the route by which the subject was exposed to the substance.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identification of the route by which the subject was exposed to the substance.

name: $note
desc: Returns: Additional text about the adverse reaction event not captured in other fields.
